name: Digivice Icon on Dashboard (Tumblr)
description: You ain't no peasant, welcome chosen children!
additional_info:
Original code by carnivaled http://userstyles.org/styles/72455/sherlock-silhouette-tumblr-dashbpard-home-icon

All I've done was changing the picture and adjusting the padding. I'm putting it here just to share it with tumblr digifans.
If you're new here, be aware you'll need to install the Stylish add-on for firefox.
